meanings.definition: A person or company that installs something, such as equipment or software.
meanings.sent1: The installers arrived early to set up the new computers in the office.
meanings.sent2: The installers did a great job putting in the new security system.
meanings.sent3: The installers had a race to see who could finish setting up the TV first.
meanings.sent4: The installers were like wizards, magically making the internet work in the building.
meanings.sent5: Watching the installers at work was like seeing a puzzle come together perfectly.

meanings.definition: The act of installing or setting up something.
meanings.sent1: The installers of the new playground equipment worked diligently to finish on time.
meanings.sent2: Proper installers of software ensure everything runs smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The installers of the new art exhibit had to be careful not to break any fragile pieces.
meanings.sent4: The installers of the stage lights transformed the theater into a magical space.
meanings.sent5: The installers of the solar panels made the house more energy-efficient.
